workspaceName.description: The name of the workspace / project being generated. Different from Nx's workspaceName. This option will usually be passed by genesis.

workspaceScope.description: The scope of the workspace. Usually the org's name. This option should be passed by Nx automatically.

description.description: A description of what this new workspace will accomplish

skipGitHub.description: Whether or not to skip GitHub repository generation

skipInstall.description: Whether or not to skip package manager install

registry.description: URL for registry to use in generated repository
